meanings.definition: Austral: of or relating to the south
meanings.sent1: The penguins enjoyed the austral weather in Antarctica.
meanings.sent2: The austral winds brought a chill to the southern regions.
meanings.sent3: The austral sun made the snowmen jealous.
meanings.sent4: Her austral personality shone brightly in the group.
meanings.sent5: The austral landscape was breathtakingly beautiful.

meanings.definition: Austral: a monetary unit of Argentina, replaced by the peso in 1992.
meanings.sent1: He collected old australs as a hobby.
meanings.sent2: The market exchange rate for australs was fluctuating.
meanings.sent3: She found a hidden stash of australs in the attic.
meanings.sent4: In his dreams, australs turned into golden butterflies.
meanings.sent5: The sound of australs jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.
